attributes.action: promote, urgently and actively, the commissioning of new nuclear generating capacity in the United Kingdom in order to ensure security of supply until other, non-fossil, supplies can be mobilised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following a meeting on the subject of global climate change and its probable causes, the South Wales Association of the Institution of Civil Engineers (SWA-ICE) Retired Engineers Group (REG) resolved to petition the PM under four headings:
nuclear power generation, off-peak hydro-electric pumped storage  generation, tidal power generation and
energy saving initiatives.  This is the first, supported by 70% of the group.
